title: Person In Lotus Position Light Skin Tone
description: A person meditating in the lotus position, with a light skin tone. Represents peace, mindfulness, yoga, and spiritual practice.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person in lotus position with a light skin tone is depicted with serene grace, bathed in soft, ambient light that accentuates their smooth, rounded form. The subtle 3D shading gives the figure a gentle, almost sculpted appearance, embodying a sense of peaceful contemplation and mindfulness. This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for conveying calm, meditation, or a moment of personal reflection.
